text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/ValueSet/C4BBAdjudication
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/ValueSet/C4BBPayerBenefitPaymentStatus
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBAdjudicationDiscriminator

name: C4BBAdjudicationCategoryDiscriminator
title: C4BB Adjudication Category Discriminator
description: Used as the discriminator for adjudication.category and item.adjudication.category for the CARIN IG for Blue ButtonÂ®
